00020 // Volume Scattering Declarations
00021 COREDLL float PhaseIsotropic(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp);
00022 COREDLL
00023 float PhaseRayleigh(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp);
00024 COREDLL
00025 float PhaseMieHazy(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp);

00027 float PhaseMieMurky(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp);

00029 COREDLL float PhaseSchlick(const Vector &w, const Vector &wp, float g);
00030 class COREDLL VolumeRegion {
00031 public:
00032         // VolumeRegion Interface
00033         virtual ~VolumeRegion() { }
00034         virtual BBox WorldBound() const = 0;
00035         virtual bool IntersectP(const Ray &ray, float *t0,
00036                 float *t1) const = 0;
00037         virtual Spectrum sigma_a(const Point &,
00038                 const Vector &) const = 0;
00039         virtual Spectrum sigma_s(const Point &,
00040                 const Vector &) const = 0;
00041         virtual
00042                 Spectrum Lve(const Point &, const Vector &) const = 0;
00043         virtual float p(const Point &, const Vector &,
00044                 const Vector &) const = 0;
00045         virtual Spectrum sigma_t(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00046         virtual Spectrum Tau(const Ray &ray,
00047                 float step = 1.f, float offset = 0.5) const = 0;
00048 };
00049 class COREDLL DensityRegion : public VolumeRegion {
00050 public:
00051         // DensityRegion Public Methods
00052         DensityRegion(const Spectrum &sig_a, const Spectrum &sig_s,
00053                 float g, const Spectrum &Le, const Transform &VolumeToWorld);
00054         virtual float Density(const Point &Pobj) const = 0;
00055         Spectrum sigma_a(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00056                 return Density(WorldToVolume(p)) * sig_a;
00057         }
00058         Spectrum sigma_s(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00059                 return Density(WorldToVolume(p)) * sig_s;
00060         }
00061         Spectrum sigma_t(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00062                 return Density(WorldToVolume(p)) * (sig_a + sig_s);
00063         }
00064         Spectrum Lve(const Point &p, const Vector &) const {
00065                 return Density(WorldToVolume(p)) * le;
00066         }
00067         float p(const Point &p, const Vector &w,
00068                         const Vector &wp) const {
00069                 return PhaseHG(w, wp, g);
00070         }
00071         Spectrum Tau(const Ray &r, float stepSize, float offset) const;
00072 protected:
00073         // DensityRegion Protected Data
00074         Transform WorldToVolume;
00075         Spectrum sig_a, sig_s, le;
00076         float g;
00077 };
00078 class COREDLL AggregateVolume : public VolumeRegion {
00079 public:
00080         // AggregateVolume Public Methods
00081         AggregateVolume(const vector<VolumeRegion *> &r);
00082         ~AggregateVolume();
00083         BBox WorldBound() const;
00084         bool IntersectP(const Ray &ray, float *t0, float *t1) const;
00085         Spectrum sigma_a(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00086         Spectrum sigma_s(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00087         Spectrum Lve(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00088         float p(const Point &, const Vector &, const Vector &) const;
00089         Spectrum sigma_t(const Point &, const Vector &) const;
00090         Spectrum Tau(const Ray &ray, float, float) const;
00091 private:
00092         // AggregateVolume Private Data
00093         vector<VolumeRegion *> regions;
00094         BBox bound;
00095 };
00096 class VolumeIntegrator : public Integrator {
00097 public:
00098         virtual Spectrum Transmittance(const Scene *scene,
00099                 const Ray &ray, const Sample *sample,
00100                 float *alpha) const = 0;
00101 };
